verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853>ye<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> you, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3925>Learn<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> and be <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> at the <S%H4480>signs<s%> <S%H226><s%> of <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> are <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> at <S%H4480>them.<s%> <S%H1992><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H2708>customs<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H1892>vain:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> one <S%H3772>cutteth<s%> a <S%H6086>tree<s%> out of the <S%H4480>forest,<s%> <S%H3293><s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H2796>workman,<s%> with the <S%H4621>axe.<s%>

They <S%H3302>deck<s%> it with <S%H3701>silver<s%> and with <S%H2091>gold;<s%> they <S%H2388>fasten<s%> it with <S%H4548>nails<s%> and with <S%H4717>hammers,<s%> that it <S%H6328>move<s%> <S%H3808>not.<s%>

They <S%H1992><s%> are <S%H4749>upright<s%> as the palm <S%H8560>tree,<s%> but <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3808>not:<s%> they must needs be <S%H5375>borne,<s%> <S%H5375><s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H6805>go.<s%> Be <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H3372>afraid<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> them; <S%H3588>for<s%> they <S%H3808>cannot<s%> do <S%H7489>evil,<s%> <S%H369>neither<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> is it <S%H854>in<s%> them to do <S%H3190>good.<s%>

Forasmuch as there is <S%H4480>none<s%> <S%H369><s%> like unto <S%H3644>thee,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art <S%H1419>great,<s%> and thy <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> in <S%H1369>might.<s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> would <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> thee, O <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H1471>nations?<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> to thee doth it <S%H2969>appertain:<s%> <S%H3588>forasmuch<s%> as among <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2450>wise<s%> men of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4438>kingdoms,<s%> there is <S%H4480>none<s%> <S%H369><s%> like unto <S%H3644>thee.<s%>
But they are <S%H259>altogether<s%> <S%H1197>brutish<s%> and <S%H3688>foolish:<s%> the <S%H6086>stock<s%> is a <S%H4148>doctrine<s%> of <S%H1892>vanities.<s%>

Silver <S%H3701><s%> spread into <S%H7554>plates<s%> is <S%H935>brought<s%> from <S%H4480>Tarshish,<s%> <S%H8659><s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%> from <S%H4480>Uphaz,<s%> <S%H210><s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H2796>workman,<s%> and of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H6884>founder:<s%> <S%H8504>blue<s%> and <S%H713>purple<s%> is their <S%H3830>clothing:<s%> they are <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H2450>cunning<s%> men.

But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is the <S%H571>true<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H4428>king:<s%> at his <S%H4480>wrath<s%> <S%H7110><s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H7493>tremble,<s%> and the <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be able to <S%H3557>abide<s%> his <S%H2195>indignation.<s%>

Thus <S%H1836><s%> shall ye <S%H560>say<s%> unto them, The <S%H426>gods<s%> <S%H1768>that<s%> have <S%H3809>not<s%> <S%H5648>made<s%> the <S%H8065>heavens<s%> and the <S%H778>earth,<s%> even they shall <S%H7>perish<s%> from the <S%H4481>earth,<s%> <S%H772><s%> and <S%H4481>from<s%> <S%H8460>under<s%> <S%H429>these<s%> <S%H8065>heavens.<s%>

He hath <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> by his <S%H3581>power,<s%> he hath <S%H3559>established<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> by his <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and hath stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> by his <S%H8394>discretion.<s%>

When he <S%H5414>uttereth<s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> there is a <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and he causeth the <S%H5387>vapors<s%> to <S%H5927>ascend<s%> from the <S%H4480>ends<s%> <S%H7097><s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> he <S%H6213>maketh<s%> <S%H1300>lightnings<s%> with <S%H4306>rain,<s%> and bringeth <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%> out of his <S%H4480>treasures.<s%> <S%H214><s%>

Every <S%H3605><s%> <S%H120>man<s%> is <S%H1197>brutish<s%> in his <S%H4480>knowledge:<s%> <S%H1847><s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6884>founder<s%> is <S%H3001>confounded<s%> by the graven <S%H4480>image:<s%> <S%H6459><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> his molten <S%H5262>image<s%> is <S%H8267>falsehood,<s%> and there is <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7307>breath<s%> in them.
They <S%H1992><s%> are <S%H1892>vanity,<s%> and the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H8595>errors:<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of their <S%H6486>visitation<s%> they shall <S%H6>perish.<s%>

The <S%H2506>portion<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> like <S%H428>them:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is the <S%H3335>former<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> things; and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of his <S%H5159>inheritance:<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is his <S%H8034>name.<s%>
Gather <S%H622>up<s%> thy <S%H3666>wares<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land,<s%> <S%H776><s%> O <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of the <S%H4693>fortress.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will sling <S%H7049>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> at <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H6471>once,<s%> and will <S%H6887>distress<s%> them, <S%H4616>that<s%> they may <S%H4672>find<s%> it so.

Woe <S%H188><s%> is me <S%H5921>for<s%> my <S%H7667>hurt!<s%> my <S%H4347>wound<s%> is <S%H2470>grievous:<s%> but <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H389>Truly<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> is a <S%H2483>grief,<s%> and I must <S%H5375>bear<s%> it.

My <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> is <S%H7703>spoiled,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H4340>cords<s%> are <S%H5423>broken:<s%> my <S%H1121>children<s%> are gone <S%H3318>forth<s%> of me, and they are <S%H369>not:<s%> there is <S%H369>none<s%> to stretch <S%H5186>forth<s%> my <S%H168>tent<s%> any <S%H5750>more,<s%> and to set <S%H6965>up<s%> my <S%H3407>curtains.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H7462>pastors<s%> are become <S%H1197>brutish,<s%> and have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1875>sought<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7919>prosper,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4830>flocks<s%> shall be <S%H6327>scattered.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H8052>bruit<s%> is <S%H935>come,<s%> and a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7494>commotion<s%> out of the north <S%H4480>country,<s%> <S%H776><s%> <S%H6828><s%> to <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H8077>desolate,<s%> and a <S%H4583>den<s%> of <S%H8577>dragons.<s%>

O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> in himself: it is <S%H3808>not<s%> in <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H1980>walketh<s%> to <S%H3559>direct<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H6806>steps.<s%>
O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3256>correct<s%> me, but <S%H389>with<s%> <S%H4941>judgment;<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> in thine <S%H639>anger,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> thou bring me to <S%H4591>nothing.<s%>

Pour <S%H8210>out<s%> thy <S%H2534>fury<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> thee <S%H3808>not,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4940>families<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> on thy <S%H8034>name:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they have eaten <S%H398>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H398>devoured<s%> him, and <S%H3615>consumed<s%> him, and have made his <S%H5116>habitation<s%> <S%H8074>desolate.<s%>
